籤詩版本二:
Ungalaleli inkulumo eyize mayelana nokulungile nokungalungile. Ekuseni nakusihlwa, ungakwazi ukusho isi-Ami kuphela.
Uma amagama asendle eyiqiniso, incwadi ethi "How to Stop Hungry" ibhalwe ngegama elithi "Jiang", futhi leli yigama elithi "Jiu".
詩意:
Le hexagram imele uphawu lwamakhekhe ukwanelisa indlala.
Yonke into ayinalutho futhi ayinaqiniso kangako.
解曰: Uma ingqondo ingaqiniseki, akusizi ukufunda imibhalo. Njengekhekhe elipendiwe, ukudla kunzima ukukugwinya.
籤詩故事一:
◇UCao Cao ukhuluma ngama-plums aqeda ukoma kwakhe
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, uCao Cao wahola amabutho akhe.Kwaba nokushoda kwamanzi ngenkathi eyomile futhi amasosha omile.UCao Cao waqamba amanga wathi kunehlathi leplum ngaphambili, futhi wayekwazi ukudla ama-plums lapho ukuze acime ukoma kwakhe.
(Isisho esithi "ukubheka izimbali zeplamu ukuze ucime ukoma" sivela lapha. Sivumelana "nokudweba amakhekhe ukuze sinelise indlala".)
聖意: Thandazela inhlanhla emzini wakho (okungekuhle), inhlanhla engcebweni (ungacabangi ngakho), ibhizinisi elibushelelezi (ima kancane), izithiyo zomshado (ukukhulelwa okungenalutho), abahamba ngezinyawo, izikelemu eziphuzile, kungcono ukutshala imfuyo eyisithupha kusenesikhathi, ayikulungele ukutholwa abantu (kunzima), amacala omphakathi kanye (ungajabuli) Ukufuduka kuyaqina, kulahlekile impahla, izifo, futhi kufisela izintaba namathuna izinhlanhla
古人: U-Cao Cao ukhuluma ngama-plums aqeda ukoma kwakhe
